HAS JUST ARRIVED.

SPINK & MAVETY, PROPRIETORS,

RIVER STREET, PRINCE ALBERT
ITEMS OF INTEREST.

A Shanghai dispatch says that the situation there is becoming very serious, and that the foreign troops are preparing for an attack.

An inquiry into the murder of Lord Montague has been made in London, and the police have arrested two men as suspects.

The trial of the Marquis de Talleyrand has been postponed until next week, due to the illness of the defendant.

The death of the Duke of Orleans has been announced, and his funeral will take place next month.

The以上文段来自于一份报纸的广告和通知内容。
1879. BUFFALO HALL. 1883.

The Old, Reliable Dry Goods, Clothing, Grocery, Crockery and Patent Medicine House still to the front

RETTS & Gwynne

Now an exhibition, conspicuous among them being some choice selections in Bunting and De Beige, Dress Goods, Elegant Infant Robes, Evening Shawls and Kid Gloves, Frillings, Lace Trimmings, Corsets, Hosiery, Smallfurnishings and a full line of Crook's Celebrated Black Silk Capes. Our Brown and White Ducks, Ticking, Sheetings, Jeans and Gambros, together with our English and American Prints

Make this branch of our business the most complete ever opened here, and at prices without an equal in the country. Grand Display of READY-MADE CLOTHING BOUGHT AND PAID FOR.

Men's, Women's and Boys' Suits, representing one of the largest and most fashionable clothing outfits ever shown in this district, and owing to our disappointment in not securing larger premises, we have decided to offer for the next THIRTY DAYS every article in this department at cash prices which cannot help but extinguish opposition.

Men's Knit Jerseys, Shirts, Tie Collars and Gloves, Hard and Soft American Hats and Helmets and a Big Outfit of Straw Goods—Every article new and stylish

TWENTY-FOUR DOZEN PAIRS OF Our now Celebrated Double-stitched Overalls

READY FOR INSPECTION.

We take pleasure in assuring that we are still in a position to maintain the reputation we have gained in our GROCERY DEPARTMENT.

As usual, our stock of Choice Goods is unequalled, while our Groceries, Spices, etc., will be found pure and unadulterated. Every article has been selected for its usefulness, not cheapness.

STAPLE CROCKERY

The best on the market. In PATENT MEDICINES we show a full line of every kind of simple goods.

DOMINION DAY.

Ice Celebration in Prince Albert.

MAHAFFY AND CLINKSKILL

General Supplies

And are offering the same at very low prices.

The Stock is large and well assorted. The prices are such as to give universal satisfaction. An early visit is recommended, as the choice ones are being rapidly sold out.

Stand—Next Post Office,

FIRE IN WINNIPEG.

MAMMOTH Flower and Vegetable Gardens

JOHN BROWN

New Ferry.

Le Pine's Crossing, N.B.

A fire has devastated and destroyed several residences and stores along the river bank.

This disaster has caused considerable damage to the town.

JOHN BROWN.
